src:
元朗新盤山水盈折實呎價9,900元起！入場價906.8萬元
05 Nov 2019, 18:05 by 樓市
路勁基建（1098）旗下元朗新盤「山水盈」屬低密度住宅項目，今日公布首張價單，首批推出67伙，單位全屬3房1套連工作間及洗手間，主要分布於第1座至第3座，以及第5座，其中大部分設有私人升降機大堂，實用面積由916至970平方呎。
撰文：Smart ED編輯部  ｜ 圖片：新傳媒資料室
元朗新盤山水盈入場價906.8萬元
「山水盈」定價介乎1,105.8萬至1,443.9萬元，呎價12,072至14,916元。計及150天即供最高18%折扣後，整批單位折實呎價9,900至12,232元，折實售價介乎906.8萬至1,184萬元。若選擇以建築期付款，最高可享15%折扣優惠。
首批單位有超過23%售價低於1,000萬元，呎價最便宜的單位是5座2樓B室，面積916平方呎，3房1套連工作間，定價1,105.8萬元，折實售價906.8萬元，呎價9,900元。另外，首張價單買家可獲通知安排認購1個停車位優惠，預計停車位價值為每個約138.8萬元。
延伸閱讀：【愛海頌開售】平均呎價、位置、配套、性價比 新盤一文睇晒
延伸閱讀：發展商按揭暗藏魔鬼細節 新盤VS二手樓 上車優劣比較｜樓市點睇


圖片：新傳媒資料室

text:
Yuen Long's new Panshan water surplus is priced at 9,900 yuan! Entrance price of 9.068 million yuan
05 Nov 2019, 18:05 by the property market
Road King's (1098) Yuen Long's new "Shan Shui Ying" is a low-density residential project. The first price list was announced today. The first batch of 67 units was launched. The units are all three bedrooms and one set of studios and washrooms. Blocks 1 to 3 and Block 5, most of which have private lift lobby, with a usable area of 916 to 970 square feet.
Written by: Smart ED Editorial Department | Photo: New Media Reference Room
Yuen Long new Panshan water surplus entrance price of 9.068 million yuan
The price of Shan Shui Ying is between $11.58 million and $14.439 million, and the price is between $12,072 and $14,916. After taking the maximum discount of 18% for 150 days, the whole unit is priced at 9,900 to 12,232 yuan, and the discounted price ranges from 9.068 million to 11.84 million yuan. If you choose to pay by construction period, you can enjoy up to 15% discount.
More than 23% of the first units sold for less than 10 million yuan. The cheapest unit is 5 units, 2nd floor, room B, with an area of 916 square feet, 3 rooms and 1 set of working rooms, priced at 11.05 million yuan. The price is 9.068 million yuan, and the price is 9,900 yuan. In addition, the first price list buyers can be notified to arrange for the purchase of 1 parking space discount. The estimated parking space value is about 1.38 million yuan each.
